_header: Thou gracious Lord grant me memory
_description: On the Passion — one stanza rhyme royal

CamTCC1157.First Lines:
Thowe gracious lord graunt me memoryEuer on thy passion to cry and
                    call…
CamTCC1157.Last Lines:
…Be thowe defence and my mynd encreceThy kyndnesse to remembre
                    and neuer to cese
CamTCC1157.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 8-9.
